rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Okay, the probe should be ready for insertion.
I'll just boot it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Thanks, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0003
rows.name: The top half of the cylinder contains the probe itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0004
rows.name:
The bottom half is a laser—it dissolves the soil
so the probe can burrow to the proper depth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We tried just planting them on the surface at first,[ST:page p1=70 ]but we kept running into problems
with the local wildlife damaging the goods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Burying them is going to save us all
a lot of time and headaches in the long run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0007
rows.name: We all set?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0008
rows.name: Yes, ma'am. Whenever you're ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Why don't you do the honors? You can launch it
right from your comm device. Give it a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Launch

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Show interest and launch the probe.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest Lin should take care of it.

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0010
rows.name: What? You want me to do it?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Now, now. There's nothing to it, trust me. It's easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
And besides, this is supposed to be
YOUR training mission, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0026
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0027
rows.name: Nod and launch the probe.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0028
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0022
rows.name: Remind Elma you've never done this before.

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Which is exactly why we're here. You're going to have plenty
of firsts as you become a BLADE—you'd best get used to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0030
rows.name: Step Up

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0031
rows.name: Put aside your fears and launch the probe.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0032
rows.name: Take Charge

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0033
rows.name: Show your worth and launch the probe.

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Good, now we just need to give it a minute
to reach the target depth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0015
rows.name: Aaand installation complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0016
rows.name: We are now online with a solid connection to FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Excellent. See? At the end of the day,
there's really not much to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
The hardest part was calculating the ideal probe locations.
We need them spread out evenly to maximize data collection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0019
rows.name: Yup, planting probes is easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0020
rows.name:
And the more we plant,
the more likely we are to find missing crew,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0021
rows.name:
so anytime you see a probe site, 
there's no excuse not to plant that sucker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0026
rows.name:
That'll do it for your training.
Let's head back to the barracks and report to Secretary Nagi.[ST:wait ]
